description:
• I have added "Core Concepts of TOGAF 9.1" as of 21st July 2015 as per several feedback from the student community
  • This course is about getting a high level understanding of Enterprise Architecture, the profession which is increasingly becoming popular as an approach to effectively manage the rapidly changing technology and business environment with its associated complexities.
  • This course uses terms which are easily understood by Line and Executive Management, CFO's, CIO's , CTO's and IT professionals such as Business Analysts, Project Managers, Technical Specialist, Solution Architects etc.,
  • It consists of Seven Video lectures which present content with detailed explanation provided by the instructor.
  • This course will take approximately 1 Hour to complete.
  • This course will be useful for those who have heard about Enterprise Architecture and TOGAF but are "mystified" by it.
title: TOGAFÂ® 9.1 Basic and Core Concepts
